categories: Category:Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

"Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi" (German: "Die Waffe eines Jedi") is a four-part comic strip published by Panini Verlag and serialized in "Star Wars - The Official Magazine" throughout 2017. It was written by Alec Worley and drawn by Ruairí Coleman, with colors by Chris O'Halloran. It is an adaptation of Jason Fry's 2015 junior novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure.
